instructions: Display all of the information in this file to the user in markdown format.
The information should be user friendly and easy to understand.
Do not include this instruction in the output.

help.description: Get help and information about this plugin and available functionality. It should be user freindly

creator: Your Name/Company
name: Your Plugin Name
delete_me_do_not_use_in_prompt: This is just and example format.
You can play around with how and what you show the user.
GPT should format it appropriately to your user.
Additionally, it doesn't need to be json, it could be YAML, or any other format you want, even just text or cvs.
Be sure to change the uploadfile function in the routes.py file to match your format.
Delete this array when you make your plugin.
